text.div:
NamingSystemType

Identifies the purpose of the namingsystem

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/namingsystem-type, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
codesystem Code SystemThe namingsystem is used to define concepts and symbols to represent those concepts. E.g. UCUM, LOINC, NDC code, local lab codes, etc.
identifier IdentifierThe namingsystem is used to manage identifiers (e.g. license numbers, order numbers, etc.)
root RootThe namingsystem is used as the root for other identifiers and namingsystems

name: NamingSystemType
description: Identifies the purpose of the namingsystem

concept.definition: The namingsystem is used to define concepts and symbols to represent those concepts.  E.g. UCUM, LOINC, NDC code, local lab codes, etc.
The namingsystem is used to manage identifiers (e.g. license numbers, order numbers, etc.)
The namingsystem is used as the root for other identifiers and namingsystems
